languages.text: "Ковчег сокрыт от глаз паломников. Но, учитывая особые обстоятельства, с которыми связан твой визит в обитель, я дарую тебе это право. Холл, ведущий к высшему реликварию, перекрыт врагом, но я отворю для тебя тайную галерею. Ступай в ковчег и испытай Движущую силу, паломни{mf|к|ца}. Мы вознесем молитвы охранным системам, дабы они не покарали тебя за вторжение".

"The ark is hidden from pilgrims' eyes. But considering the extraordinary circumstances of your visit to this monastery, I grant you that right. The hall that leads to the high reliquary has been barred by the enemy, but I will open a secret path for you. Enter the ark and experience the Motive Force, pilgrim. We will pray to the security systems that they may refrain from punishing you for your intrusion."
languages.original_text: "Ковчег сокрыт от глаз паломников. Но, учитывая особые обстоятельства, с которыми связан твой визит в обитель, я дарую тебе это право. Холл, ведущий к высшему реликварию, перекрыт врагом, но я отворю для тебя тайную галерею. Ступай в ковчег и испытай Движущую силу, паломни{mf|к|ца}. Мы вознесем молитвы охранным системам, дабы они не покарали тебя за вторжение".

Go to the ark and experience the Motive Force, pilgrim. We will pray to the security systems that they may refrain from punishing you for your intrusion."

languages.text: "Der Schrein ist vor den Augen von Pilgern verborgen. Doch angesichts der außergewöhnlichen Umstände Eures Besuchs in diesem Kloster gewähre ich Euch dieses Recht. Die Halle, die zum Hochreliquar führt, wurde vom Feind verbarrikadiert, aber ich werde einen geheimen Weg für Euch öffnen. Betretet den Schrein und erlebt die Antriebskraft, {mf|Pilger|Pilgerin}. Wir beten zu den Sicherheitssystemen, dass sie davon absehen, Euch für Euer Eindringen zu bestrafen."
languages.original_text: "The ark is hidden from pilgrims' eyes. But considering the extraordinary circumstances of your visit to this monastery, I grant you that right. The hall that leads to the high reliquary has been barred by the enemy, but I will open a secret path for you. Enter the ark and experience the Motive Force, pilgrim. We will pray to the security systems that they may refrain from punishing you for your intrusion."

traits.locale_text: "Der Schrein ist vor den Augen von Pilgern verborgen. Doch angesichts der außergewöhnlichen Umstände Eures Besuchs in diesem Kloster gewähre ich Euch dieses Recht. Betretet den Schrein und erlebt die Antriebskraft, {mf|Pilger|Pilgerin}. Wir beten zu den Sicherheitssystemen, dass sie davon absehen, Euch für Euer Eindringen zu bestrafen."

languages.text: « L'arche est généralement inaccessible aux yeux des pèlerins, mais au vu des circonstances extraordinaires de votre venue dans ce monastère, je vous en accorde l'accès. L'ennemi ayant condamné l'accès au grand reliquaire, je vais vous ouvrir un passage secret. Pénétrez dans l'arche et ressentez la Force Motrice, {mf|pèlerin|pèlerine}. Nous prierons les systèmes de sécurité afin qu'ils évitent de vous châtier pour votre intrusion. »
languages.original_text: "The ark is hidden from pilgrims' eyes. But considering the extraordinary circumstances of your visit to this monastery, I grant you that right. The hall that leads to the high reliquary has been barred by the enemy, but I will open a secret path for you. Enter the ark and experience the Motive Force, pilgrim. We will pray to the security systems that they may refrain from punishing you for your intrusion."

traits.locale_text: « L'arche est généralement inaccessible aux yeux des pèlerins, mais au vu des circonstances extraordinaires de votre venue dans ce monastère, je vous en accorde l'accès. Pénétrez dans l'arche et ressentez la Force Motrice, {mf|pèlerin|pèlerine}. Nous prierons les systèmes de sécurité afin qu'ils évitent de vous châtier pour votre intrusion. »

languages.text: “庇护所一般不会对朝圣者开放，但考虑到修道院目前的特殊情况，我允许你进入。通往圣堂的道路已经被敌人封锁，但我可以为你打开一条密道。进入庇护所，体验源力吧，朝圣者。我们会向安全系统祷告，请求它不要因为你的入侵而惩罚你。”
languages.original_text: "The ark is hidden from pilgrims' eyes. But considering the extraordinary circumstances of your visit to this monastery, I grant you that right. The hall that leads to the high reliquary has been barred by the enemy, but I will open a secret path for you. Enter the ark and experience the Motive Force, pilgrim. We will pray to the security systems that they may refrain from punishing you for your intrusion."

traits.locale_text: “庇护所一般不会对朝圣者开放，但考虑到修道院目前的特殊情况，我允许你进入。进入庇护所，体验原初动力吧，朝圣者。我们会向安全系统祷告，请求它不要因为你的入侵而惩罚你。”

languages.text: 「箱舟は巡礼者の目から隠されている。しかし、あなたがこの修道院を訪れた特別な状況を考慮し、あなたにその権利を与えよう。聖骨箱に通じるホールは敵に封鎖されているが、秘密の通路を教えてあげよう。巡礼者よ、箱舟に入り、原動力を体験せよ。セキュリティ・システムに、あなたの侵入を罰することがないよう祈ろう」
languages.original_text: "The ark is hidden from pilgrims' eyes. But considering the extraordinary circumstances of your visit to this monastery, I grant you that right. The hall that leads to the high reliquary has been barred by the enemy, but I will open a secret path for you. Enter the ark and experience the Motive Force, pilgrim. We will pray to the security systems that they may refrain from punishing you for your intrusion."

traits.locale_text: 「箱舟は巡礼者の目から隠されている。しかし、あなたがこの修道院を訪れた特別な状況を考慮し、あなたにその権利を与えよう。聖骨箱に通じるホールは敵に封鎖されているが、秘密の通路を教えてあげよう。巡礼者よ、箱舟に入り、原動力を体験せよ。セキュリティ・システムに、あなたの侵入を罰することがないよう祈ろう」

languages.text: «El arca está oculta a los ojos de los peregrinos. Pero considerando las extraordinarias circunstancias de su visita a este monasterio, les concedo ese derecho. El salón que lleva al gran relicario está obstruido por el enemigo, pero le abriré un camino secreto. Entre en el arca y experimente la Fuerza Motriz, peregrin{mf|o|a}. Rezaremos a los sistemas de seguridad para que no les castiguen por la intrusión».
languages.original_text: "The ark is hidden from pilgrims' eyes. But considering the extraordinary circumstances of your visit to this monastery, I grant you that right. The hall that leads to the high reliquary has been barred by the enemy, but I will open a secret path for you. Enter the ark and experience the Motive Force, pilgrim. We will pray to the security systems that they may refrain from punishing you for your intrusion."

traits.locale_text: «El arca está oculta a los ojos de los peregrinos. Pero considerando las extraordinarias circunstancias de su visita a este monasterio, les concedo ese derecho. Entre en el arca y experimente la Fuerza Motriz, peregrino. Rezaremos a los sistemas de seguridad para que no les castiguen por la intrusión».

languages.text: "Hacıların arkı görme izni yoktur. Ancak manastırı ziyaretine sebep olan olağanüstü koşullar düşünüldüğünde sana o hakkı tanıyorum. Yüce kutsal emanet odasına giden salon düşman tarafından kapatıldı ancak senin için gizli bir yol açacağım. Ey hacı, arka gir ve Devinim Gücü'nü tecrübe et. Güvenlik sistemlerinin, izinsiz girişin nedeniyle seni cezalandırmaması için dua edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "The ark is hidden from pilgrims' eyes. But considering the extraordinary circumstances of your visit to this monastery, I grant you that right. The hall that leads to the high reliquary has been barred by the enemy, but I will open a secret path for you. Enter the ark and experience the Motive Force, pilgrim. We will pray to the security systems that they may refrain from punishing you for your intrusion."

traits.locale_text: "Seyyahların gözleri, arkı göremez. Ancak manastırı ziyaretine sebep olan olağanüstü durumlar düşünüldüğünde sana giriş izni veriyorum. Kutsal emanet odasına giden salon düşman tarafından kapatıldı ancak senin için gizli bir yol açacağım. Seyyah, arka gir ve Devinim Gücü'nü tecrübe et. Güvenlik sistemlerinin, izinsiz girişin nedeniyle seni engellemeye çalışmaması için dua edeceğiz."
